messages.subject: Advice needed
messages.msgSnippet: All, Thinking of getting myself a Xmas present. Short on budget this time around so it ll be a book and not a sword. I already have Connoisseur s Book of
messages.messageBody:
All,

Thinking of getting myself a Xmas present. Short on budget this time around
so it'll be a book and not a sword. I already have Connoisseur's Book of
Japanese Swords <http://tinyurl.com/yj4tzqr>, is it worthwhile to get Modern
Japanese Swords and Swordsmiths: From 1868 to the
Present<http://tinyurl.com/yfj4d8w>?
If you're familiar with the latter, let me know if it's worth it, or maybe
make a recommendation on a better choice?

Best,

Andres


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
